servinfo.title: Keyless Entry System Operation Inspection

attention3.ptxt: When performing the this inspection, make sure to have any of the door once opened / closed after the ignition key has been removed from the ignition key cylinder.

s1.ptxt: Confirm that power door lock system operates normally, refer to Power Door Lock System Operation Inspection .
All doors are closed and unlocked.

s2.ptxt: Push “lock” button (1) on transmitter (2) or remote controller once, and check all doors lock and hazard waning lights flash once.

Push “unlock” button (3) on transmitter (2) or remote controller twice, and check all doors unlock and hazard waning lights flash twice and interior light turns on several seconds with the interior light switch in the middle position.

servinfo.ptxt: If malfunction is found, go to Keyless Entry System Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped) .
